title: Computer Architecture
subtitle: Evolution of computer architecture
desc: Explore the evolution of computer architecture and key milestones in its development.

title: Assembly Language
subtitle: Introduction to assembly language
desc: Learn the basics of assembly language and how it is used in modern computing.

title: Performance Measurements
subtitle: Benchmarking and performance metrics
desc: Understand the importance of benchmarking and performance metrics in software development.

title: Compiler Design
subtitle: Fundamentals of compiler design
desc: Discover the principles of compiler design, including lexical analysis, parsing, and optimization techniques.

title: Intermediate Code Generation
subtitle: Code representation and transformations
desc: Learn about intermediate representations (IRs) in compiler design and their role in code optimization.

title: Optimizing Compilers
subtitle: Techniques for improving code efficiency
desc: Explore various optimization strategies used by compilers to enhance program performance.

title: JIT Compilation
subtitle: Just-in-Time compilation and execution
desc: Understand how Just-in-Time (JIT) compilation works and its impact on runtime performance.
